import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import CustomLoader from '../custom_loader' import axios from 'axios'; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie' import StudioSections from './studiosections' function reducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case 'updateNode': return [...state]; } } var headerNode = { "type": "header", "title":"", "description":"", "name":"" } export default function MenuStudio() { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, []); const [cookies, setCookie] = useCookies(['access_token']) const [laodingStatus, setlaodingStatus] = useState(false) const [activePageIndex, setActivePageIndex] = useState(0) const [pageTitle, setPageTitle] = useState("") const [pagesList, setPagesList] = useState([]) const {menuId,menuName} = useParams() function removeMenuPage(){ if(!pagesList) return; if(pagesList.length <= 1){ alert("This operation not allowed if total pages less that 2 pages") return } setlaodingStatus(true) axios.delete('page/'+pagesList[activePageIndex].id) .then(res => { getMenuPages() }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.message) }) } function updateMenuPage(){ if(!pageTitle) return; setlaodingStatus(true) axios.put('page/'+pagesList[activePageIndex].id,{name:pageTitle}) .then(res => { getMenuPages() }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.message) }) } function getMenuPages(){ axios.get('page?menu_id='+menuId) .then(res => { setPagesList(res.data) setActivePageIndex(0) setPageTitle("") setlaodingStatus(false) }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.message) }) } function submitNewPage() { if (pageTitle.length == 0) alert("Page title required") else{ setlaodingStatus(true) axios.post(`page`, {name:pageTitle,menu_id:menuId}) .then(res => { getMenuPages() }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.response.data.message); }) } } useEffect(() => { axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = cookies.access_token; getMenuPages(); }, []) return (
  • { e.preventDefault(); updateMenuPage();}}>Save Page
  • |
  • { e.preventDefault(); removeMenuPage();}}> Remove Page
  •    
  • setPageTitle(e.currentTarget.value)} placeholder={pagesList[activePageIndex] && pagesList[activePageIndex].name} /> / {menuName}
